file.title: Source file URL
file.description: Direct link to the document to convert (PDF, DOCX, PPTX, image, HTML, EPUB, etc.).

file_base64.title: Base64 document
file_base64.description: Base64 encoded document payload. Provide either a URL or base64, not both.

filename.title: Filename hint
filename.description: Optional filename (e.g. report.docx) to help detect file type when using base64 inputs.

output_format.title: Output format
output_format.description: Choose the format for the output.

paginate_output.title: Paginate output
paginate_output.description: Insert page break markers in the output.

use_llm.title: Use LLM refinements
use_llm.description: Leverage an LLM for higher fidelity formatting (requires a configured LLM backend).

disable_image_extraction.title: Disable image extraction
disable_image_extraction.description: Skip image extraction to reduce payload size.

page_range.title: Page range
page_range.description: Specify which pages to process. Accepts comma-separated page numbers and ranges (e.g. 0,5-10,20).

force_ocr.title: Force OCR
force_ocr.description: Force OCR processing on the entire document, even for pages that might contain extractable text.

strip_existing_ocr.title: Strip existing OCR
strip_existing_ocr.description: Remove all existing OCR text in the document and re-OCR with Surya.

languages.title: OCR languages
languages.description: Optionally specify a comma-separated list of OCR languages (e.g. en,fr,de).

model.title: Converter model
model.description: Choose the converter pipeline to run.
